mapper.select: SELECT , meta.pro_Name, sd.depart_name, sc.company_name, su.user_name initUserFullname FROM dh_process_instance ins left join dh_process_meta meta on ins.pro_App_Id = meta.pro_App_Id and ins.pro_Uid = meta.pro_Uid left join sys_department sd on ins.depart_no = sd.depart_uid left join sys_company sc on ins.company_number = sc.company_code left join sys_user su on ins.ins_Init_User = su.user_uid where ins.ins_uid = #{insUid}
mapper.update:
UPDATE DH_PROCESS_INSTANCE
INS_TITLE = #{insTitle},
INS_DESCRIPTION = #{insDescription},
INS_ID = #{insId},
INS_PARENT = #{insParent},
INS_STATUS = #{insStatus},
INS_STATUS_ID = #{insStatusId},
PRO_APP_ID = #{proAppId},
PRO_UID = #{proUid},
PRO_VER_UID = #{proVerUid},
INS_INIT_USER = #{insInitUser},
INS_CREATE_DATE = #{insCreateDate},
INS_INIT_DATE = #{insInitDate},
INS_FINISH_DATE = #{insFinishDate},
INS_UPDATE_DATE = #{insUpdateDate},
INS_DATA = #{insData},
INS_DURATION = #{insDuration},
INS_DELAY_DURATION = #{insDelayDuration},
INS_DRIVE_FOLDER_UID = #{insDriveFolderUid},
INS_ROUTING_DATA = #{insRoutingData},
COMPANY_NUMBER = #{companyNumber},
DEPART_NO = #{departNo},
TOKEN_ID = #{tokenId},
TOKEN_ACTIVITY_ID = #{tokenActivityId},
INS_BUSINESS_KEY = #{insBusinessKey}
INS_UID = #{insUid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DH_PROCESS_INSTANCE () VALUES ( #{insUid}, #{insTitle}, #{insDescription}, #{insId}, #{insParent}, #{insStatus}, #{insStatusId}, #{proAppId}, #{proUid}, #{proVerUid}, #{insInitUser}, sysdate, sysdate, #{insFinishDate}, sysdate, #{insData}, #{insDuration}, #{insDelayDuration}, #{insDriveFolderUid}, #{insRoutingData}, #{companyNumber}, #{departNo}, #{tokenId}, #{tokenActivityId}, #{insBusinessKey} )
mapper.select: SELECT , meta.pro_Name, sd.depart_name, sc.company_name FROM dh_process_instance ins left join dh_process_meta meta on ins.pro_App_Id = meta.pro_App_Id and ins.pro_Uid = meta.pro_Uid left join sys_department sd on ins.depart_no = sd.depart_uid left join sys_company sc on ins.company_number = sc.company_code where ins.ins_id = #{insId}

SELECT , meta.pro_Name, sd.depart_name, sc.company_name FROM dh_process_instance ins left join dh_process_meta meta on ins.pro_App_Id = meta.pro_App_Id and ins.pro_Uid = meta.pro_Uid left join sys_department sd on ins.depart_no = sd.depart_uid left join sys_company sc on ins.company_number = sc.company_code where ins.ins_id = #{insId} and ins.ins_Parent='0'

SELECT , meta.pro_Name, sd.depart_name, sc.company_name FROM dh_process_instance ins left join dh_process_meta meta on ins.pro_App_Id = meta.pro_App_Id and ins.pro_Uid = meta.pro_Uid left join sys_department sd on ins.depart_no = sd.depart_uid left join sys_company sc on ins.company_number = sc.company_code where ins.ins_id = #{insId} and ins.token_activity_id = #{tokenActivityId}

select ins.INS_UID,ins.ins_id,ins.INS_TITLE,ins.INS_STATUS_ID,meta.pro_name,su.user_name as initUserFullname, (select listagg(task_title,';') within group (order by task_uid) from dh_task_instance where ins_uid = ins.ins_uid and (task_status = '12' or task_status = '-2' )) as taskTitle, (select listagg(su.user_name,';') within group (order by task_uid) from dh_task_instance taskInfo left join sys_user su on taskInfo.usr_uid = su.user_uid where ins_uid = ins.ins_uid and (task_status = '12' or task_status = '-2' ))as handleUserName from DH_PROCESS_INSTANCE ins left join SYS_USER su on ins.INS_INIT_USER = su.user_uid ,DH_PROCESS_META meta where ins.pro_uid = meta.pro_uid and ins.pro_app_id = meta.pro_app_id and ins.ins_status_id != -2
and ins.ins_title like concat(concat('%',#{insTitle}), '%')
and su.user_name like concat(concat('%',#{initUserFullname}), '%')
mapper.update:
UPDATE DH_PROCESS_INSTANCE
INS_STATUS = #{insStatus},
INS_STATUS_ID = #{insStatusId},
ins_update_date = #{insUpdateDate},
where ins_id = #{insId}
